sourcesContent: import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent { actions : Array =[ {title :"Home", "route":"/home", icon : "house"}, {title :"Products", "route":"/products", icon : "search"}, {title :"New Product", "route":"/newProduct", icon : "safe"} ]; currentAction :any; setCurrentAction(action: any) { this.currentAction = action; } }
